item.title: Being Productively Creative---Artist vs. Designer
item.description: Have you ever experienced “writer’s block” or “masterpiece syndrome?” Here’s some advice on how to frame your mind, get into problem solving and be productively creative.

item.title: S2S: Stairs to Success
item.description: For most of us, success depends on the interaction with other human beings. S2S is a simple method that can help you be more successful. I’ll show you how.

item.title: Useful Hugo Templating
item.description: Developing templates for the static website generator Hugo? Then these advanced tips & tricks might be helpful to you.

item.title: Redesign March 2020
item.description: On this day three years ago, I launched my blog. Today, I publish its first redesign: bigger, bolder, bluer, and (hopefully) better than its predecessor.

item.title: Improving Your Chances with Non-Negotiables
item.description: Your chances of winning any game improve drastically once you learn the rules. But what if there aren’t any clear rules? Non-Negotiables are here to help.

item.title: Test Your Way to Success
item.description: Ever spent too much time on something that turned out to be based on the wrong assumptions? Here’s how to make sure that you’re investing your time correctly.

item.title: The Making of the Ypertex Logo
item.description: The approach behind the creation of the Ypertex logoâ€”and the similarities between visual designs (like logos) and conceptual designs (like IT solutions).
